page.title: 01WHITKIRK AND CROSSGATES 1
page.content:
The area of our survey covers the suburbs of{Whitkirk}and{Crossgates}on the eastern outskirts of the city of {Leeds.}Approximately one-third of the area is{residential housing}and {shopping areas,}but a few areas of {light industry}can be found, particularly on the northern edge of the D-block. The remaining two-thirds is mostly{farmland and open fields.
The{main trunk road, A63,}from Leeds to Selby crosses the area NW to SE, as does the{main railway line}from Leeds to Selby and Hull, and York and Scarborough. Elsewhere there are a number of{minor country}roads linking smaller towns and villages.
In the SE corner of the block is{West {Garforth,}part of a large residential village and housing estate.
